summary: "TAKATA RECALL"  AS I WAS DRIVING DOWN HIGHWAY. I HEARD A SAFETY DING AND I NOTICED MY AIR BAG SAFTEY LIGHT WAS ON. I TOOK IT TO THE DEALERSHIP AND TOLD ME IT WAS TO DUE THE THE AIRBAG SENSOR AND COULD NOT BE FIXED AT THIS TIME. THAT WAS BACK IN THE BEGINNING OF THE YEAR. TO DATE THERE IS NO REMEDY.
